#summary Mapping Service API - Explaining the XML Data API

<h1>Mapping Service API - XML Data</h1>

_Note 1: The Mapping Service is currently undergoing extensive revisions including the rewrite of much of the underlying code. Therefore functionality may not be available or behave differently dependant progress of the revision work._

_Note 2: Where an API has been successfully updated it will be noted in the documentation below._

The following documentation provides an overview of the API exposed by the MappingService which can be used to retrieve data stored in stand alone XML files. Most notably the files created by the AbsDataFix application

<wiki:toc max_depth="3" />

= Retrieve ABS Data =

ABS data is grouped together by collection district and contains information derived from the [http://www.abs.gov.au/census 2006 Census]

== Base URL ==

The base URL for the retrieval of marker data is as follows:

http://beta.ausstage.edu.au/mapping/xmldata?type=abs-data

== Request Type ==

Get Request

== Parameters ==

|| *Name * || *Allowed Values* || *Optional* || *Default* ||
|| id      || collection district code || No || ||

== Sample Ouptut ==
http://beta.ausstage.edu.au/mapping/xmldata?type=abs-data&id=8014105

{{{
<html>
  <head></head>
  <body>
    <h2>Collection District Details</h2>
